skills.label: Manage page layout
items: Combine containers, collapse and expand paragraphs, set an image as a background, save current page as template

skills.label: Configure OneNote notebook Backstage
items: Configure notebook settings and properties, pin recently opened notebook to list

skills.label: Create new OneNote notebook
items: Create a new notebook on onedrive, create a new notebook on a network, create a new notebook on my computer

skills.label: Personalize OneNote
items: Default font and size, display settings, proofing settings, language settings, research and translation options

skills.label: Personalize page setup
items: Page color, rule lines, grid lines, page title, paper size, full page view, dock to desktop

skills.label: Share OneNote notebooks
items: Share notebook on: onedrive, sharepoint document library, network drive

skills.label: Share OneNote content via email
items: Email others about the notebook and configure email options, invite others to view a notebook, email page in shareable formats

skills.label: Collaborate in OneNote
items: Mark coauthor edits as read, view recent edits, find notes by author, hide author initials

skills.label: Use OneNote notebook organization tools
items: Merge sections, create new section group, color code notebooks and sections, protect with password, group and collapse subpages, use side notes

skills.label: Search OneNote
items: Search for content across notebooks, sections, or pages

skills.label: Use History and Backups in OneNote
items: Page versions, notebook recycle bin, open backup notebook

skills.label: Save Notebook As
items: Save current page, save as alternate file types

skills.label: Use Quick Filing
items: Send to email messages, meetings notes, contact notes, tasks, webpages, screenshots, print to onenote

skills.label: Use and manage tags
items: Apply tags to paragraphs, create new tags, modify existing tags, create tag summary page, configure tag options, find tags
